sentences.en: Barley is one of cereal crops with salinity tolerance.
sentences.cn: 大麦是禾谷作物中较为耐盐的粮食作物.

sentences.en: E, which increases the packing salinity heat sealing punctuation performance and strength.
sentences.cn: 从而提高了包装袋的耐穿刺性能和热封强度.

sentences.en: Each card has not only a date but the latitude and longitude, salinity measures, temperatures and depth of each data point.
sentences.cn: 每个卡片不仅记有日期，还有每个数据点的纬度和经度，盐度，温度和深度的测量。

sentences.en: Eastern Wei Bridge Corporation, white song zhuang severe salinity tidal Corporation soil.
sentences.cn: 东魏家桥公社 、 白宋庄公社为重度盐渍化潮土.

sentences.en: Here the ocean is being diluted so that the salinity is decreased.
sentences.cn: 与蒸发相反的是降水,如降雨,由此水被加入海中,海水被稀释,从而盐度降低.

sentences.en: In many sedimentary basins the salinity of the formation water increases with depth or compaction.
sentences.cn: 在许多沉积盆地中,地层水的含盐量随深度或压实作用而增高.

sentences.en: In the sea water sampled the salinity is two parts per thousand.
sentences.cn: 在取样的海水中,盐度为千分之二.

sentences.en: Other factors influence phytoplankton growth rates, including water temperature and salinity, water depth, wind, and what kinds of predators are grazing on them.
sentences.cn: 还有其他的因素影响着浮游植物的生长率，包括水温、盐度、水深、风，以及猎食它们的天敌的种类。

sentences.en: Salinity content and characteristic of farmland soil in Shanghai suburb was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了上海市郊部分旱作农田土壤盐分特征.

sentences.en: Salinity refers to the total concentration of salts present in the soil solution.
sentences.cn: 含盐量是指土壤溶液中所存在的盐类的总浓度.

sentences.en: Temperature and salinity are two important factors for the fish fry breeding.
sentences.cn: 摘要温度及盐度是鱼类苗种生产当中2个重要的因子.

sentences.en: The Atlantic Ocean had undergone changes in temperature and salinity.
sentences.cn: 大西洋海水的温度和盐度已经发生了变化。

sentences.en: The differences in density may be due to temperature or to salinity.
sentences.cn: 这种密度的差异源于温度和盐度的差别.

sentences.en: The longitudinal salinity gradient in summer is larger than that in winter.
sentences.cn: 冬季湾内盐度空间梯度较小.

sentences.en: The seawater flowing backward can result in serious salinity of paddy soil.
sentences.cn: 海水倒灌可导致水田土壤严重盐渍化.

sentences.en: The solubilities of the gases generally decrease with increased water salinity and increase with pressure.
sentences.cn: 气体的溶解度通常随水的盐度增加而降低,随压力增高而增高.

sentences.en: The vertical distribution of temperature and salinity uniform from top to bottom.
sentences.cn: 温度和盐度的垂直分布从上到下均匀一致.

sentences.en: Those ratios provide clues about the temperature and salinity of the water in which the corals were immersed, Watanabe says.
sentences.cn: 渡边刚表示，这些同位素比例为珊瑚生长环境的海水温度及盐度情况提供了线索。
